pages.text: Automotons can move in four horizontal directions, relative to the direction they face, using the move forward, move left, move right, and move back modules.

Automotons can turn left or right, using the turn clockwise or turn counterclockwise modules. An automoton can also turn randomly using the random turn module.$(br2)Finally, automotons can follow the block below them. The scan & move module instructs an automoton to move in the direction pointed by the block below it - typically a pointer block (but any tagged, directional block is acceptable).
The scan & rotate module is similar to the scan & move module, except it turns the automoton towards the direction pointed by the block below, rather than moving.
